ctx: intros l i i' H_sorted H_lt.
induction l as [| e es IH].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros l i i' H_sorted H_lt. induction l as [| e es IH]. - simpl. auto. - simpl. destruct (eIndex e <=? i) eqn:Heindex. + simpl. rewrite Heindex. apply removeAfterIndex_eq. intros e' H_in. apply sorted_findGtIndex_0. * apply sorted_findGtIndex_0. * apply removeAfterIndex_sorted. apply H_sorted. * apply H_in. + simpl. rewrite Heindex. apply findGtIndex_sufficient. * apply H_sorted. * apply H_sorted. * apply H_lt. * apply IH. apply (removeAfterIndex_sorted (e :: es) i). apply H_sorted. * auto.
